mapper.select:
select no,title,content,to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')wdate,startDate, endDate,firstYn,fileName from notice
where endDate < sysdate-1
where startDate > sysdate
where startDate <= sysdate and endDate >= sysdate-1
order by firstYn desc, no desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice(no, title, content, startDate, endDate, fileName, firstYn) values(notice_SEQ.nextval,#{title},#{content},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{fileName},#{firstYn})
